                  distribution = "gaussian",
                  n.trees = 300,
                  shrinkage = 0.1,
                  interaction.depth = 5,
                  n.minobsinnode = 10,
                  bag.fraction = 1,
                  cv.folds = 5,
                  )

summary.gbm(Adam_w_gbm)
